---
title: "testosterone_data_analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r}

testosterone_health <- NHANES |>
  filter(Gender == "male", !is.na(Testosterone)) |>
  select(Testosterone, 
         BPSysAve, BPDiaAve, Pulse, TotChol, # Cardio
         BMI, Weight,                        # Body Comp
         UrineFlow1,                         # Urine
         HealthGen, Diabetes, PhysActive)    # General Health

testosterone_health

```


```{r}
cleaned_health_data <- testosterone_health |.
  distinct() |>
  drop_na() |>
  mutate(
    HealthGen = factor(HealthGen, levels = c("Poor", "Fair", "Good", "Vgood", "Excellent"))
  )

print(dim(cleaned_health_data))
```


```{r}
model <- lm(Testosterone ~ ., data = cleaned_health_data)
summary(model)
```
